title: Data Entry - Enjoyable & Simple - Flexible Schedule - Starting $2+/hour
salary: Starting $2/hr - Increase rate with time and good work -  Potential bonuses
job_overview:
We're an educational company with over 8 years of experience with dozens of VA's from the Philippines.

We're looking to expand our team and bring on more VAs, primarily for data entry and research tasks.

Our supportive team in the Philippines feels like a family, and we provide clear instructions to help you succeed.

With our strong team backing you, youâ€™ll have the flexibility to work on your own schedule.

Good Luck & God Bless
